Content:: 2020 in sports 2020 in sports describes the year's events in world sport. Many sporting events around the world have been postponed or cancelled because of the COVID-19 pandemic, including the 2020 Summer Olympics and Paralympics, which eventually took place in 2021.[1] January 10 – 15: in Lausanne Three of the four major championships were rescheduled due to the COVID-19 pandemic, and one was canceled. One of the four championships was rescheduled due to the pandemic, and one was canceled. Three of the five major championships were rescheduled due to the pandemic. Two of the five major championships were canceled due to the pandemic. One of the two major championships were canceled due to the pandemic.
Title: 2020 in sports - Wikipedia
